0011001001010110 1101001010110110 1 -> sum: 0000010100001101, cout: 1
1010011111011110 1011110001110010 0 -> sum: 0110010001010000, cout: 1
1100011001011110 1001001011100011 0 -> sum: 0101100101000001, cout: 1
0100000000101011 1100111100101100 1 -> sum: 0000111101011000, cout: 1
0010110101101100 0010001001000000 0 -> sum: 0100111110101100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
